rules.natural: If the worker can use the hammer, then the worksite is safe.
Either the worker can use the hammer or the worker can use the screwdriver.
Provided that the worker is certified in safety training, whenever the worker needs support for the beam, the beam has stability on the platform.
Under the condition that the crane is operational, the hoist is functional.
The crane is operational or the worksite is safe.
Whenever the cable is damaged, the hoist is not functional.
Either the cable is damaged or the pulley is broken.
The crane is inspected by the engineer or the crane is inspected by the technician.
Provided that the crane is inspected by the technician, in the event that the pulley is broken, the hoist is not functional.
Whenever maintenance is scheduled daily, if the crane is inspected by the engineer, then under the condition that the pulley is broken, the hoist is not functional.
If inspection is completed in the morning, maintenance is scheduled daily.
Under the condition that the safety harness is available, the worksite is safe.
Either the safety harness is stored in the locker or the safety harness is stored in the toolbox.
Provided that the safety harness is stored in the toolbox, the safety harness is available.
Under the condition that the locker is accessible to the worker, if the safety harness is stored in the locker, the safety harness is available.
Whenever the toolbox is accessible to the worker, in the event that the safety harness is stored in the locker, the safety harness is available.
Provided that the generator is powered on, the engine is not running.
Either the generator is powered on or the worksite is safe.
Whenever power is supplying the tools, the engine is running.
Provided that the generator is fueled with diesel, the generator is maintained by the mechanic.
Under the condition that the generator is maintained by the mechanic, the air filter is cleaned by the mechanic.
Provided that the worker has access to the ladder, whenever the worker can use the screwdriver, the worksite is safe.
Under the condition that the oil level is checked by the mechanic, if the generator is powered on, power is supplying the tools.
If the air filter is cleaned by the mechanic, the oil level is checked by the mechanic.
Either the saw is positioned on the workbench or the saw is positioned on the sawhorse.
Under the condition that the saw is positioned on the sawhorse, the worksite is safe.
Provided that the saw is secured on the workbench, if the saw is positioned on the workbench, the worksite is safe.
Under the condition that the saw is secured on the sawhorse, whenever the saw is positioned on the workbench, the worksite is safe.
If the work surface is stable, then either the saw is secured on the workbench or the saw is secured on the sawhorse.
Provided that the table is wobbling, the surface is level.
Under the condition that the table is wobbling, the surface is not level.
Either the table is wobbling or the work surface is stable.
Provided that the worker has access to the scaffold, under the condition that the worker can use the screwdriver, the worksite is safe.

Under the condition that the issue is documented in the logbook, if it is not the case that the defect being reported to the supervisor implies the pulley is not functional, then repair is authorized for the maintenance crew.
Either the issue is documented in the logbook or the issue is documented on the tablet.

Provided that the issue is documented on the tablet, in the event that it is not the case that the defect being reported to the supervisor implies the pulley is not functional, repair is authorized for the maintenance crew.
Either the worker needs support for the beam or the worker needs support for the column.
Whenever the worker needs support for the column, the worker has access to the scaffold.
If the beam has stability on the platform, the worker has access to the ladder.
Under the condition that the worker is approved by the supervisor, the worker is certified in safety training.
Either the worker is approved by the supervisor or the worker is approved by the foreman.
If the worker is approved by the foreman, then whenever the worker needs support for the beam, the beam has stability on the platform.
Under the condition that it is not the case that the locker is accessible to the worker or the toolbox is accessible to the worker, the cabinet is locked.
Provided that it is not the case that a defect being identified in the pulley implies that if the pulley is broken, the hoist is not functional, the pulley is functional.
